list_translation_mean.translate_mean: dây nịt áo ngực phụ nữ
làm nổi lằn roi trên da

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a fine open fabric, typically one of cotton or silk, made by looping, twisting, or knitting thread in patterns and used especially for trimming garments.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a dress trimmed in white lace
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Một chiếc váy được cắt tỉa trong ren trắng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a cord or leather strip passed through eyelets or hooks on opposite sides of a shoe or garment and then pulled tight and fastened.
fasten or tighten (a shoe or garment) by tying the laces.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he put the shoes on and laced them up
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh đặt giày lên và tẩm chúng lên
